actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to compensate certain individuals from whom title to land was taken by the Federal Government pursuant to the American-Mexican Chamizal Convention Act of 1964 without just compensation.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of State to compensate specified individuals for specified lands acquired by the United States pursuant to the American- Mexican Chamizal Convention Act of 1964. Sets forth the formula determining the amount of such compensation.

titles.title: A bill to compensate certain individuals from whom title to land was taken by the Federal Government pursuant to the American-Mexican Chamizal Convention Act of 1964 without just compensation.
